text:
April 6/ 1960
(M
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
96 Saint Joseph Street
Toronto 5, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
If it were possible to have preview showing of CBC Teenager film in
Columbus, it would be wonderful. Would it be possible? If so, I
will contact Keith Tyler to see if it couldn't be scheduled as some
sort of special feature. ’Will it be half hour?
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
President
hjsrrs
CC: Dr. I. Keith Tyler
Mr. William G. Harley
P. S. to CC Recipients: This is being filmed tomorrow, for CBC broad¬
cast May 18. Explains the media and teenagers in clearest fashion I’ve
yet seen anywhere — with humor andwhimsey besides. Have just read
script.
